calculator_description: Amount, origin/destination currency (PEN, USD, BRL), rate and commission.
send_money_to_brazil_peru: Send money to Brazil and Peru with the best rates.
safe_fast_transparent: Safe, fast, and transparent transfers. No hidden fees, just great service for your loved ones.
chat_initial_message_2: I'm the Brasper bot. How can I help you today?
landing_title: Send soles, dollars and reais to Brazil and Peru with the best exchange rate.
landing_description: Simulate in seconds how much your recipient receives, with competitive rates, multilingual support, and full transparency from step one.
landing_feature_1_description: Check the exchange rate and complete your transfer without long or confusing flows.
landing_feature_2_description: Before confirming, you always see fees, rate applied, and exact final amount received.
landing_feature_3_description: We apply security best practices to protect your account and each transfer.
landing_feature_4_description: Our team supports you via WhatsApp and digital channels to solve questions in real time.
landing_step_1_description: Register with your basic data and validate your profile in a few steps.
landing_step_2_description: Enter amount and currency to instantly preview the final conversion.
landing_step_3_description: Complete payment and follow transfer status from your dashboard.
landing_section_brazil_description: Deposit into local bank accounts with confirmation and transfer traceability.
landing_section_peru_title: Reliable payments for family and business
landing_section_peru_description: Operate with clear conversion and real-time tracking from your dashboard.
landing_testimonial_1_quote: I use it every month for my family in Lima. It's clear, fast, and never surprises me.
landing_testimonial_2_quote: The calculator saves me time because I can see exactly how much they'll receive before sending.
landing_testimonial_3_quote: Support really responds. They helped me through the full process from my first transfer.
landing_faq_1_question: How long does a transfer take?
landing_faq_1_answer: It depends on the receiving bank, but most operations are confirmed within minutes.
landing_faq_2_answer: You can currently operate with PEN, BRL, and USD depending on the available transfer flow.
landing_faq_3_question: Can I review my transfer history?
landing_faq_3_answer: Yes. Once inside your dashboard, you can see status, amounts, and details for each operation.
landing_faq_4_answer: No. Before confirming, we always show commission and applied exchange rate.
landing_section_cta_description: Create your account and move money with a platform built for people operating between Brazil and Peru.
landing_schedule_transfer_description: Plan your international transfer in advance and get the best exchange rate
landing_mission_description: To offer online remittance services from Brazil to Peru and from Peru to Brazil, with the greatest speed, reliability, security, and the best exchange rate, guaranteeing the quality of our services and developing excellent relationships with our local and regional customers.
landing_vision_description: To be an organization with a competitive advantage in regional remittance transfers that transcend time, through the ethical development of its employees and a sustainable approach.
landing_about_company_title: Connect Your World, Maximize Your Value
landing_about_company_description: In a globalized and increasingly connected world, making international transfers and currency exchanges efficiently, safely, and with competitive rates is essential for both individuals and businesses. At Brasper Transfers, we specialize in offering a currency exchange and international transfer service that stands out for its transparency, reliability, and personalized attention. Our mission is to make every transaction simple and worry-free so that you can focus on what really matters.
landing_contact_feature_1_title: Your Best Choice for Currency Exchange
landing_contact_feature_1_description: Get the best value for your money with competitive rates and reliable service.
landing_contact_feature_2_description: Maximize your earnings by choosing a reliable exchange house.
landing_security_description: It is essential to choose an entity regulated by the relevant financial authorities, both in Peru and Brazil, to ensure the protection of your funds.
landing_partners_description: We work with recognized institutions that guarantee the reliability and transparency of our services
landing_partner_ccl_description: Brasper is associated with the Lima Chamber of Commerce, one of the most important business institutions in Peru. This association guarantees that we operate under the highest standards of transparency, reliability and commitment to the country's economic development.
landing_best_rates_title: We provide the best exchange rates for transfers
landing_best_rates_transfers_description: A bank transfer is a process by which money is moved from one bank account to another.
landing_best_rates_quotations_descriptio: In the context of an exchange house or an entity that deals in currency exchange, a quotation refers to the value or rate at which one currency can be exchanged for another at a given time.
landing_best_rates_shipments_description: Fast and secure shipments with Brasper transfers.
landing_best_rates_services_description: The services we provide are not only secure transfers but also offer advice and financial insights.
landing_best_rates_improvement_descripti: With us, you will have confidence in improving your transfers and we offer you a discount on your first transfer with us.
landing_simple_guide_title: Buy or sell your Reais, Soles, or Dollars in 4 simple steps
landing_simple_guide_step_1_description: Get a quote and enter the amount you want to exchange.
landing_simple_guide_step_2_description: Register and make the transfer to the BrasPer Transferencias account and send us the proof of operation.
landing_simple_guide_step_3_description: Receive your exchange. We will deposit the money into the registered account.
landing_simple_guide_step_4_description: If you were satisfied with our service, recommend us to more people.
footer_description: Brasper is a company specialized in currency exchange services, focused mainly on the conversion of Brazilian reals to Peruvian soles and vice versa, as well as the exchange of US dollars.
